Reviews.Title: GS Wholesale Rating Manipulation
Reviews.Author: A. Dhaliwal
Reviews.Content: It is a very disingenuous practice to write a 5 star "customer review" of a product that you are a seller of. Even if it is under the guise of "Additional Product Info!", it is still manipulating the rating system at Amazon, since customers sort searches with average customer rating and your products come out on top. Because of your lack of integrity as a seller, I will never buy a GS Wholesale product. I am also going to complain to Amazon about your rating manipulation.

Reviews.Title: Very poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: malibukid22
Reviews.Content: Fairly big, impressive looking camera. Burglars will certainly notice it. Picture quality is terrible -very blurry/fuzzy. Night picture is very grainy and has about a 15' range. I bought a cheap $30 camera from Harbor Freight that is far superior to the Swann. Swann tech support said "this is our low end camera so picture is low res."

Reviews.Title: great cams
Reviews.Author: Samuel L. Smith "TECHMAN"
Reviews.Content: These security cams work like secound eyes during the day and at night up to 20',My order was shipped on time with a great price.Thanks AMAZON.
